title: Version 2.00 released.
message:
Version 2.00 released.

Major changes:
* major stability and bugfixing update
* better support for rare iPod commands

title: Version 1.22
message:
Version 1.22
	* critical bug fixed wich caused application crashes after upgrade to 1.19

1.19
    * Core engine rewritten to support future built in players
    * Several glitches fixed
    * Support for applications added: TIDAL, PowerAmp, MixZing
    * When ListSize information is provided in the broadcast (supported
    * by
    some apps) PodEmu will emulate 1 album that will be browsable from
docking
    station
    * several bug fixed and stability improved

title: Version 1.18
message:
Version 1.18
    * added version info to logfile and mail body
    * fixed polling mode notification (cmd 0x0027) for track position
    * and playlist position status change.
    * added support for monochrome images

title: * Support for FT311D/FT312D added
message:
* Support for FT311D/FT312D added
* bug fixed in communication protocol (command 0x0017)
* logging enhanced (timestamp changed to human readable form)

title: Changes:
message:
Changes:
* different launcher icon sizes added
* fixed startup bug when no ctrl app set

title: Several fixes and improvements
message:
Several fixes and improvements
 * changed from Instrumental class to Intents for key press actions
 * added live screenshot
 * added pseudo playlists for some car audios to work

title: Main application functionality finalized and tested.
message:
Main application functionality finalized and tested.
Changes/bugfixes:
* added support for simple mode
* added logging of stack traces
* improved handling application/service lifecycle
* added Android Free Development icon set
* improved debug gathering
* added license and credits information
* fixed cp2102 read buffer issue
* added driver/buffer size mapping

title: Several fixes and improvements:
message:
Several fixes and improvements:
* added debug options to the settings menu
* added license and credits options to the settings menu
* icons library added
* added dynamic read buffer fix (required for some usb-serial chips)

title: Several bug fixes and improvements:
message:
Several bug fixes and improvements:
* enhanced look and feel
* image blocks processing moved to OAPMessenger class
* statuses update fixes

title: First version reliably working with PL2303 driver. Changes:
message:
First version reliably working with PL2303 driver. Changes:
 * GPL infos added
 * cable connect disconnect routines added
 * service start/stop sorted out
 * several bugs fixed

title: * Added support for extended image messages
message:
* Added support for extended image messages
* First successful tests with 04 mode on dock station

title: Development in progress:
message:
Development in progress:
- background buffer thread is working
- background byte receiving and message processing thread is working
